Title: Relates to recurring payments to the non-custodial parent in special circumstances in child support proceedings involving joint or shared custody of children
Summary: Relates to recurring payments to the non-custodial parent in special circumstances in child support proceedings involving joint or shared custody of children.
LawCode: Amd ยง413, Fam Ct Act; amd ยง240, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and domestic relations law, in relation to recurring payments to the non-custodial parent in special circumstances in child support proceedings involving joint or shared custody of children
